titleStmt.title: A declaration or test to distinguish Protestant-dissenters from papists and popish recusants as it was given to the Parliament in the year 1680. by the people called Quakers, and now re-printed.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Penn; attribution questioned by Smith.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
